title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3005/92 of 12 October 1992 extending the validity of Regulation (EEC) No 4280/88 concerning the safeguard measure laid down in Article 2 of Decision No 5/88 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee amending Protocol 3
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 3005/92  of 12 October 1992  extending the validity of Regulation (EEC) No 4280/88 concerning the safeguard measure laid down in Article 2 of Decision No 5/88 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee amending Protocol 3
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The validity of Regulation (EEC) No 4280/88 is hereby extended for an indefinite period of time.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply as from 1 January 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 12 October 1992. For the Council
The President
W. WALDEGRAVE
(1) OJ No L 171, 27. 6. 1973, p. 2. (2) OJ No L 381, 31. 12. 1988, p. 14. (3) OJ No L 381, 31. 12. 1988, p. 31. (4) See page 12 of this Official Journal.
